alert.note: Alert for Southern La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 24 at 9:45AM EST until December 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Southern La Porte County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds and cold temperatures will also lead to areas of blowing snow and slick roads today into tonight.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
